title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 380-9.12 - Dispute resolution forum and board guidelines
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 380-9.12 - Dispute resolution forum and board guidelines

State Regulations
(a) The dispute resolution forum and its
arbitrators shall adhere to any guidelines published by the board for the
resolution of paid family leave disputes. (b) All parties subject to the provisions of
this Subpart shall be subject to any rules promulgated by the dispute
resolution forum with respect to its own internal procedures regarding the
administration of disputed claims, to the extent that such rules are not
inconsistent with guidelines published by the board or this Subpart. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
380-9.12

Adopted

New

York State Register July 19, 2017/Volume XXXIX, Issue 29, eff. 7/19/2017

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
